name: Pix Band
description:
Controls:

A: Hit note farthest to the left

S: Hit note second farthest to the left

D: Hit note in the middle

F: Hit note second farthest to the right

Space: Hit note farthest to the right

Green Squares: Start game

Red Squares: Exit game/leave level

Description:

A pixel version of popular music games like Guitar Hero or Rock Band. Try to match notes in the middle of the screen with their respective keys to complete the song. More updates to come. 

Note:

Due to how Unity's UI works, the "square" button's sizes may vary depending on screen size. I hope this can be overlooked seeing as this isn't something I can fix.
